fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Convert another player to a random Sith Offensive role. You only convert the roles if they are any of the following:
Town/City
Neutral Benign
Neutral Evils/Chaos with the witch wincon of seeing Town/City lose
-2-shot: Enable both yourself and the other Sith member to use the factional kill tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, only one other Sith may spawn. Any other Sith slots will be converted to Random Neutral slots.
-The Sith faction cannot increase beyond two members by any means while you are alive.
-Can perform the Sith factional kill.
-Has private chat with the other Sith.
-Conversion Immune
